评论详情: Its kinda big if you are built smaller. I am 5’7 123-129 lbs and it was baggy. I am built more for junior sizes so if you are too then this would be a bigger looser fit.

5'5" 135 36D.  Bought this turtleneck in every color.  Bought as a layering option to wear under sweaters in the cold weather.  Went with medium based on reviews but definitely could have worn a small.  I generally like base layers to be fitted and this is comfortably loose, but not too large to work under sweaters. I could also easily wear it by itself.  The neck isn't tight, which is important bc I can't stand anything tight against my neck. I wear it folded down and it is a perfect height on my neck.  I wouldn't consider this a true thermal base layer, but it is a nice medium thickness, soft and stretchy and does add some warmth.  I highly recommend

I’ve bought this turtleneck in three different colors because I love the light fleece-y inside so much! However, I’ve noticed I have to be very careful while laundering them or else they get super worn looking and need depilled. They don’t shrink after washing, but be conservative in how frequently you launder them and make sure it’s using a gentile + low heat cycle if you want to keep them from looking ratty.
The turtle neck runs short. If you have a bit of belly you will be continually tucking it in. The arms fit nice but the torso should be longer.

I kept this turtleneck even though it is polyester, and I prefer cotton. I had hoped to use it for biking in the winter, but it is not thick enough, and also makes me sweat. I ordered a large. I was really excited to try this shirt because I’m always on the lookout for a cozy winter staples and the quality didn’t disappoint. The fabric feels so soft and warm, perfect for colder days. The fit everywhere else was spot on and I loved how it hugged my body without being too tight. However, the neck was just too big for my taste. It created a slouchy look, and didn’t feel flattering when I wore it. If you’re a fan of a looser, more relaxed turtleneck this could be a great option for you but personally, I prefer a snugger fit around the neck overall, still a nice shirt just not quite what I expected for my style
